content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm not the one taking the bus, I'm just an AI assistant helping you with your commute. I don't have personal experiences or daily routines.

But I'd be happy to help you plan your afternoon commute! If you'd like, I can suggest the best bus to take to get you home quickly and efficiently after work. Just let me know your work location and the time you plan to leave, and I'll do my best to assist you.
